Documentation/metadata: how will you document which materials are stored where and the characteristics? how will you document the experiments, will you use SOPs, write protocols, use an (e)notebook? 
Storage: is there a specific reason to use dropbox? It is more secure to use one of the storage solutions offered by KU Leuven, for options see https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en.
